name: 4K Race Refueled
overview: Embark on a thrilling journey in the fast-paced universe of 4K Race Refueled, the captivating 2005 sequel to the iconic 4K Race. Emerging from the esteemed legacy of the 2004 Minigame Competition, this edition redefines the standards of ZX Spectrum racing games, offering an electrifying and immersive racing experience. Crafted meticulously by the talented trio of Paolo Ferraris, Luciano Costarelli, and Mario "Chrome" Prato, prepare for an adrenaline-pumping adventure that pushes the boundaries of speed and strategy.
